plot: In a world of mountains of trash, a father and son confronts their ultimate fight for survival as they seek their only chance for refuge and redemption from war.
title: The Mountain Thief
plot_es: In a world of mountains of trash, a father and son confronts their ultimate fight for survival as they seek their only chance for refuge and redemption from war.
plot_en: In a world of mountains of trash, a father and son confronts their ultimate fight for survival as they seek their only chance for refuge and redemption from war.
